TEXT.Spanish: Jewish Sanhedrin

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sanhedrin[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salomons Tempel[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jüdischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judentum[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold.
